subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Paolo Bettini won the first back-to-back world road race titles in 15 years, rallying in a sprint finish in Germany. The race took place two days after Stuttgart city authorities lost a court battle to bar Bettini for refusing to sign an antidoping pledge.
